value:
$WmMPID_立会人サウル,ch02_33_Saul_M_Wedding21,Face|Ahh... Finally, a chance to catch
my breath.$k$pSo many ceremonies are happening
today, I haven't had a moment's rest.$k$pSo many women, but all of them are
part of a happy couple. I can't even
strike up a conversation...$k$pI have given everything for the sake
of the people. Is there to be no
reward for me?$k$pFor even one beautiful woman to
call out to me would be enough...$k$p$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|You there!$k$p$WmMPID_立会人サウル,ch02_33_Saul_M_Wedding21,Face|I— Hm? Yes? Can I help you?$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Yes! I'm glad to see you're not
a groom.$k$pI would not feel good about asking
a bride's beloved to get involved...$k$p$WmMPID_立会人サウル,ch02_33_Saul_M_Wedding21,Face|I'm sorry... Are you— Behind that
mask... Err...what is it that you
need from me?$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|An attack is upon us, originating
from the Tempest. I need your
assistance in repelling our foes.$k$pWe wouldn't want to ruin the festival
for all the happy couples...$k$p$WmMPID_立会人サウル,ch02_33_Saul_M_Wedding21,Face|Repelling an attack... Right...$k$pSaint Elimine, grant me the strength
to overcome these trials...$k$p

$WmMPID_立会人サウル,ch02_33_Saul_M_Wedding21,Face|Phew... It seems all the enemies
have fled...$k$p$WmMPID_仮面ルキナ,ch04_23_Marth_F_Mask,Face|Yes, and it's all thanks to you, Saul.$k$pNow, I must depart, but...I hope you
have a blessed festival as well.$k$p$WmMPID_立会人サウル,ch02_33_Saul_M_Wedding21,Face|Hah. Well, I certainly have done
my share of service... I will pray
for us both. Good-bye.$k$pNow then... I wonder how things
are going at the festival.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁シャーロッテ,ch05_37_Charlotte_F_Wedding17,Face|Aha! There you are! I've been
searching all over for you!$k$p$WmMPID_立会人サウル,ch02_33_Saul_M_Wedding21,Face|A blessing so soon? Yes, what can
I do for you, young lady?$k$pAh, I know... Would you care to hear
a lengthy sermon on the nature of
Saint Elimine's love?$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁シャーロッテ,ch05_37_Charlotte_F_Wedding17,Face|Er, no! I was wondering if you'd
mind giving me a flower from
your outfit...$k$p$WmMPID_立会人サウル,ch02_33_Saul_M_Wedding21,Face|One of these? Of course! It's no
trouble at all.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁シャーロッテ,ch05_37_Charlotte_F_Wedding17,Face|WOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!$k$pEr, I mean... Thank you so much!$k$pBy the way... How many ceremonies
have you been to today? Seems like
a lot...$k$pThere's a rumor going around that
you're good luck for love with how
many ceremonies you've overseen!$k$pAnd now that I've got a flower you
were wearing... Heh heh hehhh...
I'm going to find myself a rich man!$k$p$WmMPID_立会人サウル,ch02_33_Saul_M_Wedding21,Face|...Huh. Well, there she goes...
Where did this rumor come from?$k$pMore importantly, if there's a rumor
going around—$k$p$WmMPID_レオ,ch10_11_Leo_M_Normal,Face|There you are! You're Saul, right?
Stay right where you are!$k$p$WmMPID_ガトリー,ch09_20_Gatrie_M_Normal,Face|I don't care what it is, please just
give me something for luck! Even
a strand of your hair will do!$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁ティアモ,ch04_17_Tiamo_F_Wedding17,Face|Umm... I would also like some luck,
if it's all right to ask...$k$p$WmMPID_立会人サウル,ch02_33_Saul_M_Wedding21,Face|Well, people have flocked to me,
calling out to me, but...is this the
blessing of the heavens?$k$p*sigh* I suppose one ought not to
perform works with the expectation
of reward. Another lesson learned...$k$p
